 2012-14022012-10-25JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectHon. Gregory Ellies ** REMOVAL ALLOWANCE **
PrecisOrder authorizing additional reimbursement periods for the Hon. GREGORY ELLIES, a judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, further to his relocation from North Bay, Ontario to Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario for (1) maintenance expenses for his former residence for the period beginning on February 12, 2012 to August 11, 2012; and (2) interest on Loans for the period from January 13, 2012 to July 12, 2012.
AttachmentsAttachment
